attributes.action: Re open the petition for pass I.d
attributes.additional_details: Pass I.Ds are a legal form of I.D for people over 18 that do not have or want or cannot afford a passport or driving license. All shop accept these but pubs and clubs will not, police encourage these forms of I.D as it can be a problem for police when lost or stolen passports get forged and also cost a lot of money to replace.also people with disabilities who cannot get a driver's license then have to buy a passport even if they do not need one just so they can go out for a drink.
attributes.background: Recognise pass I.D e.g citizen cards as a form of I.D in pubs and clubs

rejection.details:
Pubs and clubs can choose which forms of ID they accept. 

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to create a new law requiring pubs and clubs to accept all forms of ID in their venues.
